answers.answer:
MedZirka offers cost-free medical services online and offline, including consultations with family doctors, therapists, or pediatricians, medical prescriptions, referrals to specialists, sick leave, vaccination certificates, and referrals for laboratory testing. They also provide consultations on a wide range of diseases, from common illnesses like the flu and cold to chronic conditions affecting various body systems.

To find more detailed information, please visit the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medzirka and read under the sections "Services provided by MedZirka" and "List of topics you can ask about."
